li.a: What Independent Studies Classes Are Like
How Mentors Inspire, Challenge, and Guide Students
Is LAU Right for My Student?

div.class: gf_even post-8621 page type-page status-publish hentry

p.span: This official website, the LAU Family Blog, and official LAU Twitter and Facebook pages are the only Internet sites sanctioned by the school. The school does not sponsor, approve, monitor, supervise, control, post-to, sanction or otherwise take responsibility for the content of any other Internet sites, including, but not limited to, websites, Facebook and Twitter pages, social networking sites, chat rooms, news groups or blogs (collectively, “non-school sanctioned sites”). Because the content posted on non-school sanctioned sites has not been approved by the school, it does not necessarily represent the opinions, curriculum or legitimate pedagogical purpose of the school. As always, parents are advised to supervise their children’s Internet use.

p.br:
Monday - Thursday M-TH 9:00 am - 4:00 pm
Friday 9:00 am - 1:00 pm MST and by appointment
Closed weekends and holidays
